task.title: Duplicating a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Duplicate a pipeline when you want to keep the existing version of a pipeline while continuing to configure a duplicate version. A duplicate is an exact copy of the original pipeline.

context.p: When you duplicate a pipeline, you can rename the pipeline. By default, the duplicate pipeline name is <original pipeline name>copy.
After the duplication, the treats the pipelines as completely separate, individual pipelines.necessary? delete?

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline that you want to duplicate.
In the Duplicate Pipeline dialog box, enter a name for the duplicate pipeline and click Duplicate.
step.stepresult: The pipeline displays in the canvas.
